org.apache.ignite.cache.hibernate

Class HibernateAccessStrategyAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.hibernate.HibernateAccessStrategyAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HibernateNonStrictAccessStrategy, HibernateReadOnlyAccessStrategy, HibernateReadWriteAccessStrategy, HibernateTransactionalAccessStrategy

    public abstract class HibernateAccessStrategyAdapter
extends Object
    Common interface used to implement Hibernate L2 cache access strategies.

    The expected sequences of steps related to various CRUD operations executed by Hibernate are:

    Insert:

    • Start DB transaction.
    • Execute database insert.
    • Call insert(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).
    • Commit DB transaction.
    • Call afterInsert(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).
    In case if some step fails and DB transaction is rolled back then afterInsert(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object) is not called.

    Update:

    • Start DB transaction.
    • Call lock(java.lang.Object).
    • Execute database update.
    • Call update(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).
    • Commit DB transaction.
    • Call afterUpdate(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).
    In case if lock(java.lang.Object) was called, but some other step fails and DB transaction is rolled back then unlock(java.lang.Object) is called for all locked keys.

    Delete:

    • Start DB transaction.
    • Call lock(java.lang.Object) for removing key.
    • Execute database delete.
    • Call remove(java.lang.Object).
    • Commit DB transaction.
    • Call unlock(java.lang.Object).
    In case if lock(java.lang.Object) was called, but some other step fails and DB transaction is rolled back then unlock(java.lang.Object) is called for all locked keys.

    In case if custom SQL update query is executed Hibernate clears entire cache region, for this case operations sequence is:

    • Start DB transaction.
    • Call lockRegion().
    • Execute database query.
    • Call removeAll().
    • Commit DB transaction.
    • Call unlockRegion().
